channel.title: Can't run any server
channel.description:
Ok so my problem is that, I downloaded a clean client and a clean server source to start making a server again after a long time, so I make the ip to my server in the client and compile, then I run the server and login and it always says error connecting. I tried like 3 different servers and 3 different clients to see if it was a problem with only the first client and server I downloaded but it's not.
I have no-ip software downloaded JDK 6 Update 18 JRE 6 Update 20
Anyone know what could be wrong? It's pretty complicated I can't figure it out :S
Thanks

item.title: Can't run any server
item.dc:creator: @Dead_Inside Dead Inside
item.description:
@Dead_Inside wrote:

Yes I know, i’m not that much of a noob lol ;p I wrote down that I already did put the ip int the client.

item.title: Can't run any server
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Go into the CLIENT files.
Open Gui.java
Look for something like this

System.out.println("Loading client.."); Serverip = "127.0.0.1"; sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip)); initUI(); }

Make sure yours says 127.0.0.1 OR the ip that you’re connecting to.

Read full topic
